artifacts.config.items.antidoteVessel.en: Whether the Antidote Vessel reduces the duration of negative effects

artifacts.config.items.bunnyHoppers.fall: How much the Bunny Hoppers reduce or increase fall damage
Values between -1 and 0 reduce fall damage
artifacts.config.items.bunnyHoppers.jump: The amount of extra jump strength the Bunny Hoppers apply to players
artifacts.config.items.bunnyHoppers.safe: The amount of extra safe fall distance in blocks that is granted by the Bunny Hoppers
How much the Charm of Shrinking decrease or increase the player's Scale
Values between -1 and 0 reduce the player's scale
Values above 0 increase the player's scale

artifacts.config.items.chorusTotem.consu: Whether the Chorus Totem is consumed after activating

artifacts.config.items.chorusTotem.telep: The probability that the Chorus Totem activates when a player dies
artifacts.config.items.cloudInABottle.en: Whether the Cloud in a Bottle allows the wearer to double jump
artifacts.config.items.cloudInABottle.sa: The amount of extra safe fall distance in blocks that is granted by the Cloud in a Bottle

The amount of extra vertical velocity that is applied to players that double jump while sprinting using the Cloud in a Bottle

artifacts.config.items.crystalHeart.heal: The amount of extra health points that are granted by the crystal heart

How much the Running Shoes increase the wearer's step height while sprinting

artifacts.config.title: Artifacts Config
artifacts.tooltip.ability.apply_mob_effe: Applies a temporary fire resistance effect after taking fire damage
Increases the wearer's movement speed after taking damage
Grants a temporary boost to mining speed after eating food
artifacts.tooltip.ability.attribute_modi: Causes the wearer's melee attacks to deal fire damage
Increases damage dealt by the wearer
Causes the wearer's melee attacks to absorb health
Increases knockback dealt by the wearer
Increases the wearer's attack speed
Decreases the time it takes to drink items
Decreases the time it takes to eat items
Reduces fall damage taken by the wearer
Increases the wearer's flatulence
Increases the length of invincibility after taking damage
Increases the wearer's jump height
Grants immunity to knockback
Increases the wearer's maximum health
Increases the speed of ridden mounts
Increases the wearer's walking speed on snow
Increases the wearer's maximum safe fall distance
Shrinks the wearer
Makes ice less slippery to walk on
Increases the wearer's movement speed while sprinting
Increases the wearer's step height while sprinting
Improves agility in water
Increases the wearer's mining speed
Increases experience dropped by creatures
Decreases the trading prices of villagers
artifacts.tooltip.ability.double_jump: Allows the wearer to double jump
artifacts.tooltip.ability.grow_plants_af: Plants grow after eating when standing on grass
artifacts.tooltip.ability.increase_encha: Applies %s extra levels of fortune to mined blocks
Applies an extra level of fortune to mined blocks
Applies %s extra levels of looting to killed entities
Applies an extra level of looting to killed entities
Applies %s extra levels of Luck of the Sea when fishing
Applies an extra Luck of the Sea when fishing
Applies %s extra levels of Lure when fishing
Applies an extra level of Lure when fishing
artifacts.tooltip.ability.limited_water_: Allows the wearer to breathe underwater
Allows the wearer to breathe underwater for a limited amount of time
artifacts.tooltip.ability.night_vision.f: Allows the wearer to see in the dark
artifacts.tooltip.ability.night_vision.p: Allows the wearer to see in the dark slightly
artifacts.tooltip.ability.remove_bad_eff: Greatly reduces the duration of negative effects
artifacts.tooltip.ability.replenish_hung: Slowly replenishes hunger while walking on grass
artifacts.tooltip.ability.set_attackers_: Grants fire resistance after lighting an attacker on fire
Has a chance to light attackers on fire
artifacts.tooltip.ability.sinking: Allows the wearer to move freely in water
artifacts.tooltip.ability.sprint_on_flui: Allows the wearer to walk on fluids while sprinting
artifacts.tooltip.ability.strike_attacke: Has a chance to strike attackers with lightning
artifacts.tooltip.ability.swim_in_air.ke: Press %s while in the air to start swimming
artifacts.tooltip.ability.swim_in_air.sw: Allows the wearer to swim in the air for a limited period of time
artifacts.tooltip.ability.teleport_on_de: A fatal hit has a chance to teleport you somewhere else instead
A fatal hit teleports you somewhere else instead
artifacts.tooltip.ability.thorns: Has a chance to damage attackers
artifacts.tooltip.ability.upgrade_tool_t: Increases the wearer's base mining level to %s
artifacts.tooltip.ability.walk_on_powder: Allows the wearer to walk on Powder Snow
artifacts.tooltip.item.novelty_drinking_: 'Hey! I'm #1, and I let gravity do my drinking!'
artifacts.tooltip.item.umbrella.shield: Can be used as a shield
Whether the cosmetics toggle tooltip should
be shown even when cosmetics are toggled on
Location of the artifact cooldown gui element
Distance from the hotbar measured in pixels
Negative values place the element left of the hotbar
Display artifacts on cooldown next to the hotbar
Whether models for gloves are shown in first person
Whether artifacts have tooltips explaining their effects
Use modded chest textures for Mimics
Whether mimics can use textures from Lootr or Quark
Archaeology chance
The chance that an artifact generates in suspicious sand or gravel
Artifact rarity
Affects how common artifacts are in chests
Values above 1 will make artifacts rarer
Values between 0 and 1 will make artifacts more common
Set this to 10000 to remove all artifacts from chest loot
Campsite
Allow light sources
Whether campsites can contain blocks that emit lights
Campsite count
Amount of campsite generation attempts per chunk
Set this to 0 to prevent campsites from generating
Maximum Y-level
The maximum height campsites can spawn at
Mimic chance
Probability that a campsite contains a mimic
Minimum Y-level
The minimum height campsites can spawn at
Use modded chests
Whether chests from other mods generate in campsites
Entity Equipment Chance
The chance that a skeleton, zombie or piglin
spawns with an artifact equipped
Everlasting Beef chance
The chance everlasting beef drops when a cow
or mooshroom is killed by a player
Modify player hurt sounds
Whether the Kitty Slippers and Bunny Hoppers
change the player's hurt sounds
